desc: The BunnyHug is a specially designed wearable hooded blanket made with the utmost care. It is a premium, oversized, double-layered blanket hoodie created for winter snuggling – And it will keep you warm too. While you would normally use a blanket on your couch to combat the cold, the BunnyHug is much better solution.

layout.text: You’Ll Feel Comfy And Relaxed Each Time You Wear It. BunnyHug™ Blanket Hoodie Is Incredibly Soft And Cosy
